attributes.action: I feel we need to have a new general election
attributes.additional_details: Our country is at its worse state than ever, illegal migration has gone up to the point half the country is afraid to leave their house because they continue to abuse the people that was born here, our community’s are failing we need support not a lie we wish comes true we need hope and Keir Starmer has taken our hope and us people of this country want it back
attributes.background: Have a new general election to have the people vote a new prime minister and have a representative that can be a voice for the people so that we feel heard.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
